title: IceWarp security advisory (AV26-148)
description: On February 19, 2026, IceWarp published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included was a critical vulnerability affecting the following products:
products: IceWarp Epos Update 2  versions prior to 14.2.0.12
IceWarp Epos Update 1  versions prior to 14.1.0.20
IceWarp Epos (1st generation)  versions prior to 14.0.0.18
Deep Castle and older versions  versions prior to 13.0.3.13
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
